properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ADDRESS , MEMBER_ADDRESS2 , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE , MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ADDRESS , MEMBER_ADDRESS2 , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE , MEMBER_ENROLLDATE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_ID = ? , MEMBER_PWD = ? , MEMBER_NAME =? , MEMBER_ADDRESS = ? , MEMBER_ADDRESS2 = ? , MEMBER_EMAIL = ? , MEMBER_PHONE = ? WHERE MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, CREATE_DATE)) < = ? GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ASC

SELECT BOARD_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , CREATE_DATE , COUNT , M.MEMBER_NAME , CG_NAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY C USING (CG_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT RES_NO , RES_PLACE , RES_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_NAME , RES_MSG FROM BBQ_RV WHERE RES_DATE = ? AND RES_STATEMENT = 'Y'
SELECT RES_NO , RES_PLACE , RES_DATE , RES_PEOPLE , RES_NAME , RES_MSG FROM BBQ_RV WHERE RES_STATEMENT = 'Y' ORDER BY RES_DATE
UPDATE BBQ_RV SET RES_STATEMENT = 'N' WHERE RES_NO = ?
